location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough Sketch Chart of Kuweit, Fao, M’gussa and Surrounding Country’

physicalDescription.extent: Material:Pen and ink on paper with additions in pencilDimensions:209 x 182 mm, on sheet 271 x 220 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map of Kuweit [Kuwait], Fao [Al Faw], M'Gussa [Umm Qasr] and surrounding country attached to a letter dated 20th February 1902.Anchorage near M'Gussa [Umm Qasr] and Khor al Subiyah area lettered with their coordinates reported below title. Shows the location of Turkish Camp.Additions in pencil including place names added along the northern coast of Kuwait Bay.
